medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant and epigastric pain with nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after dinner last night, characterized as 'pressure' pain radiating to the right side of her back, with associated nausea and vomiting. There were mild episodes of pain and GERD symptoms over the past few months. Symptoms improved with treatment in the ED. No fever or chills at home, but developed these while in the ED.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Status post cholecystectomy, history of retained CBD stones, history of migraines, anemia, and GERD.
